mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Answer WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum} ORDER BY CASE WHEN replyParents = 0 THEN answerNum ELSE replyParents END, answerNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Answer(boardNum, answerContent, userID, answerDate, replyGID, replyOrder, replyParents) VALUES(#{boardNum}, #{answerContent}, #{userID}, SYSDATE, #{replyGID}, #{replyOrder}, #{replyParents})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Answer WHERE answerNum = #{answerNum} or replyGID = #{replyGID}
